SEARCH

Class VotingService

java.lang.Object
VotingService
public class VotingService extends Object
The VotingService class brings together the pieces developed in the project to allow for a Student(Question->Answer) system. With a Set of Students and a Set of Questions (which have Sets of answers), we can keep track of various statistics such as which answers are chosen, how many correct and incorrect answers are chosen, etc. This class provides implementations for those features, as well as a way to view said statistics.
Version:
1.1
Author:
George Matta

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private boolean
    hasVoted
    A boolean denoting whether or not the Answers have been chosen by the Students This ensures that we do not attempt to display statistics that have not been calculated
    private int
    numCorrect
    The number of correct answers chosen
    private int
    numWrong
    The number of wrong answers chosen
    private Set<QuestionInterface>
    questionSet
    The Set of Questions
    private int[][]
    statistics
    The statistics int matrix statistics[i][j] is the number of Students who chose Answer index j of Question index i
    private Map<Student,Set<Integer>[]>
    studentAnswersMap
    A Map of Student to their selected answers matrix matrix[i] would be the selections set made for Question index i

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VotingService(Set<Student> studentSet, Set<QuestionInterface> questionSet)
    The main constructor for the VotingService object Sets the studentSet and questionSet and initializes the statistics matrix
    VotingService(Student[] studentArray, QuestionInterface[] questionArray)
    A simple constructor for the VotingService object Delegates to the VotingService(Set, Set) constructor with sets created from the provided arrays

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    chooseAnswers()
    Runs the entire simulation by choosing Answers for every Question for every Student.
    private static int[][]
    createStatistics(Set<QuestionInterface> questionSet)
    A static method to create a viable matrix for the statistics The return matrix has many rows as there are questions, and each column has as many entries as there are possible answers for that question matrix[i][j] = Answer index j at Question index i
    private void
    initializeStatistics()
    Initializes the statistics int array depending on how many questions exist and how many answers exist for each question
    private void
    initializeStudentAnswersMap(Set<Student> studentSet)
    Intializes the Student->Answers map studentAnswersMap[student][i] would be the Set of Integer indexes of the answers of Question index i
    void
    printStatistics()
    Prints the statistics calculated

  • Method Details

    • initializeStudentAnswersMap

      private void initializeStudentAnswersMap(Set<Student> studentSet)
      Intializes the Student->Answers map studentAnswersMap[student][i] would be the Set of Integer indexes of the answers of Question index i
      Parameters:
      studentSet - The set of all Students

    • initializeStatistics

      private void initializeStatistics()
      Initializes the statistics int array depending on how many questions exist and how many answers exist for each question

    • createStatistics

      private static int[][] createStatistics(Set<QuestionInterface> questionSet)
      A static method to create a viable matrix for the statistics The return matrix has many rows as there are questions, and each column has as many entries as there are possible answers for that question matrix[i][j] = Answer index j at Question index i
      Parameters:
      questionSet - The set of all the Questions
      Returns:
      The created statistics matrix

    • chooseAnswers

      public void chooseAnswers()
      Runs the entire simulation by choosing Answers for every Question for every Student. Records the statistics to be printed later.

    • printStatistics

      public void printStatistics()
      Prints the statistics calculated
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the voting has not been done yet (chooseAnswers() wasn't called)
